attributes.action: Reject the Proposed European "Transnational Zones" and Keep The Uk as it is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the leak of an EU report, it was revealed that the Prime Minister was deeply considering splitting up the UK to form constituent parts of proposed European "Transnational Zones." 

This is preposterous and would erode not only our national identity but our history, wealth and security.

This petition urges the Prime Minister to remove the UK from these EU plans and to keep the UK as it is in it's entirity!
